mapper.select: SELECT sm.id,sm.menuname name,sm.parentid pid,sm.icon,sm.path url FROM sys_user_role sur LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sur.roleid=sr.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON sr.id=srm.roleid LEFT JOIN sys_menu sm ON srm.menuid=sm.id WHERE sur.datastate=1 AND srm.datastate=1 AND sm.datastate=1 AND sm.showtype=0 AND sur.userid=#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY sm.id ORDER BY sm.orderno

SELECT sm.id FROM sys_user_role sur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON sur.roleid=srm.roleid LEFT JOIN sys_menu sm ON srm.menuid=sm.id WHERE sur.datastate=1 AND srm.datastate=1 AND sm.datastate=1 AND sur.userid=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND sm.path=#{menuPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
